title: Speedy Stitcher Sewing Awl
description: Speedy Stitcher Sewing Awl. Use the Stitcher to sew any heavy material quickly and easily. Great for use at home; camp; farm; or on the boat. This package contains one sewing awl (4-1/2-inch by 1- 1/2-inch); one straight needle; one curved needle; and 30-yard of waxed polyester thread. Features a wood handle and metal sewing components. Made in USA.
